about_the_game:
With a cryptic note from your recently deceased father, and his strange old book, you embark on a journey that questions reality. Travelling through dimensions and spaces, where humans were never meant to go, and encountering the things that dwell at the edge of our dreams.

This is a game of Eldritch knowledge, Non-Euclidean realms and understanding beyond reason.

You have the book of arcane lore, with all the instructions you need to unlock reality and commune with the true powers of the universe. What will you do with it? Did it have something to do with your father's disappearance? Will it give you the ability to bring him back? Is the knowledge of gods, older than time, yours for the taking? 

Draw the circles of power

Copy the strange and mysterious symbols and patterns from the book into the world.  Use them to help you on the path to saving your father. Unlock their hidden meanings and discover their true powers.

Chant the sacred words

Speak the holy words as written in the book. Uncover the secret to their formula and even greater understanding is yours to unlock 

Perform the rites of ancient gods

Perform the secret hand gestures, scribe the true names of the gods and conduct rituals and ceremonies that even the gods will hear.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that is only suitable for mature audiences. Although the horror is more often inferred than displayed, player caution is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required) with DirectX 12
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2050 / AMD RX 6000 / Intel® Arc™ A550 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A first-person cosmic horror mystery about owning a book of Eldritch magic; with the instructions you need to save your father, unlock reality and master the true powers of the universe. Will it give you the ability to bring him back? Is the knowledge of gods, older than time, yours for the taking?
